widget.name: COVED
widget.description: COVED is an app created to spread awareness and educate people about this Crisis to help counter it and reduce the burden on Warriors. This is because lack of awareness created a state of confusion among the general public which leads to rising misconceptions among them worsening the scenario whereas if people have awareness then there is a better co-operation observed in tackling these situations since everyone will know about all the preventive measures and would take the care at individual level.
widget.author: NIRAJ ASHISH MHATRE
